CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),false, AND( Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , Out_of_Business__c = false , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'Oasis Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'PEO Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , (RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreAccountRecordType" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "MMSAccountRecordType") ,(ISBLANK(CPA_Name_Ref__c )||CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(CPA_Name_Ref__c )||CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Banker_Name_Ref__c)|| Banker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Banker_Name_Ref__c)||Banker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Referral_National_Account__c )||Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Referral_National_Account__c )||Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Broker_Name_Ref__c)||Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Broker_Name_Ref__c)||Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c )||Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Health_Ins__c = false) ,(ISBLANK(Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c )||Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_Wrks_Comp__c = false) ,(ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) ,((Medical__c = false || H_B_Indicator__c = false) || ISNULL(TEXT(Benefits_Administration__c))) , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, this prospect is workable for H&B products. Do Not Call = False Email Opt Out = False non HROi Out of Business = False Product Sensitivities = False PAYX H&B = False H&B Indicator = False Benefits Administration = Blank
CustomField.label: H&B Workable
